feed.subtitle: App Store Discounts - Made with love by appstore-discounts(https://github.com/appstore-discounts/appstore-discounts) feedId:67474973430475776+userId:73658201673997312 feedId:157008141708743680+userId:73658201673997312

entry.title: 🎉 欢迎订阅 App Store Discounts
entry.summary: 感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！
entry.content:
感谢您订阅我们的 RSS 源，我们是一个致力于为全球用户带来 App Store 最新折扣信息的社区驱动项目。我们的目标是让每一位用户都能第一时间掌握心爱应用的优惠动态，无论是应用本身的价格下调，还是内购项目的限时促销，我们都将为您一网打尽！

关于我们的 RSS 源

  • 专注于推送 App Store 应用的优惠信息
  • 只要应用价格降低或内购项降价，我们就会及时推送
  • 每个应用的优惠信息以单独的 feed 形式呈现
  • RSS 源完全开源，您可以随时查看、贡献和添加您关注的应用

找到我们

App Store Discounts

最后

如果本项目对你有帮助，请帮我们点个 ⭐️ 可好

entry.title: TuneIn Radio: Music & Sports
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • TuneIn Premium Pro：HK$ 788.00 → HK$ 548.00 [HK$ 548.00 ~ HK$ 788.00]

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 88.00

App 內購買項目

  • TuneIn Premium：HK$ 618.00
  • TuneIn Premium Pro：HK$ 548.00

应用描述

體育實況。音樂。新聞。播客。 TuneIn 是一個應用程式，它彙集了來自世界各地的實況體育、音樂、新聞、播客和電臺。 只需動動手指即可存取世界上最大的即時、點播和原創音訊庫，聆聽對您來說最重要的訊息，發現讓您感動的新時刻。 透過體育實況、獨家音樂頻道、快速發佈的新聞、全球超過 570 萬個播客和超過 100,000 個廣播電臺，您隨時都能聽到令您驚喜的內容。 TuneIn Premium 使用者可以收聽 Fox News Radio 的無廣告新聞以及各種不間斷的無廣告音樂電臺。 下載 TuneIn 的五大理由： 1.不錯過一場體育賽事實況 您可以在工作場所、家中、健身房和路上聆聽。即時收聽體育講座 - 基本上在任何您可以收聽和點播的地方。 2.聽不完的音樂 永遠不用擔心只能選擇由著名 DJ、有影響力的時尚先鋒和特邀嘉賓策劃的獨家音樂電臺播放的下一首歌曲。發現每個流派的最佳新歌和藝術家，以及您最喜歡的所有歌曲和藝術家。 3.全方位的爆炸性新聞 收聽地方、全國和全球來源 24 小時即時新聞播報，透過 TuneIn Premium 收聽完全沒有廣告的 Fox News。 4.您最喜愛的所有播客 從榜首的節目到新發現的優秀節目，讓自己沉浸在談話的世界中。 關注像經典節目，探索最受歡迎的熱門歌曲，如 The Rachel Maddow 的 Bag Man、The Joe Rogan Experience 和 The Economist。 5.世界上最強大的電臺 您的 FM 撥盤做不到這一點！ 播放世界各地的 100,000+ AM、FM 和網路電臺的節目。 目前流行於 [ ]:[ ]。 不僅僅是在您的 iPhone 上 TuneIn 可在 200 個平台和連接裝置上免費使用。在您鍛煉時透過 Apple Watch 播放音樂。按一下 TuneIn for CarPlay 以便在您駕車回家的路上玩遊戲。透過 Google Home、Amazon Echo 和 Alexa 讓您的播客伴您左右。 升級到 TuneIn Premium 獲得完整的體驗 • 無廣告音樂 • 無廣告新聞 • 今天的最佳播客 • 100,000 個電臺 透過應用程式訂閱 TuneIn Radio Premium。如果您選擇訂閱，則將根據您所在的國家/地區按月收取訂閱費。在您完成付款之前，訂閱費將顯示在應用程式中。您的訂閱將按當時的訂閱費每月自動續訂，除非在目前訂閱期結束前至少 24 小時關閉自動續訂。您的 iTunes 帳戶將在目前時段結束前 24 小時內自動扣費。訂閱費將按月收取。您可以隨時透過 iTunes 帳戶設定關閉自動續訂。 隱私政策：http://tunein.com/policies/privacy/ 使用條款：http://tunein.com/policies/ TuneIn 使用 Nielsen 測量軟體，該軟體使您能夠為諸如 Nielsen 的 TV Ratings 等市場研究做貢獻。要瞭解關於 Neilsen 的產品和您的隱私的更多資訊，請瀏覽 http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy。

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 8mm Vintage Camera
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • 8mm Pro：HK$ 288.00 → HK$ 78.00 [HK$ 78.00 ~ HK$ 288.00]

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 32.00

App 內購買項目

  • 8mm Pro：HK$ 78.00
  • 倒計時主題：HK$ 0.00
  • 默片主題：HK$ 0.00
  • 炫光主題：HK$ 0.00

应用描述

8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man! We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc. 8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger. SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS • Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies • Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style • 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm • 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes • Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription • Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes • Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect. • Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION - Apply film and frame effects to clips - Trim video, pan & zoom photo - Add a soundtrack from your music library - Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions 8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION - You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates - Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee - Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 地城謎蹤
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 22.00 → HK$ 18.00 [HK$ 18.00 ~ HK$ 22.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 18.00

应用描述

-- 獲獎： ● 日本 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT | 官方入選 ● 韓國 2020 釜山獨立遊戲節 (BIC Fest) | 最佳休閒獎 ● 台灣 2020 巴哈姆特 ACG 創作大賽 | 銅賞 關於此遊戲： 《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。 此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。 而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。 遊戲特色： ● 地城+解謎+倉庫番 ● 150 個精心設計的關卡 ● 地城氛圍的像素美術 ● 非線性地城地圖 -- ● 在 Twitter 上追蹤我們 https://twitter.com/nekolyst ● 在 Facebook 上幫我們點讚 https://www.facebook.com/Nekolyst ● 加入我們的 Discord 群組 https://discord.gg/A7Sss9d

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: 1941 Frozen Front Premium
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 22.00 → HK$ 8.00 [HK$ 8.00 ~ HK$ 22.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 8.00

App 內購買項目

  • 25,000資金：HK$ 38.00
  • 60,000資金：HK$ 88.00
  • 700,000資金：HK$ 688.00
  • 325,000資金：HK$ 368.00
  • 125,000資金：HK$ 148.00

应用描述

領導壯大中的德國軍隊東進或投身蘇維埃保衛祖國俄羅斯。在FROZEN FRONT中化身一位聰穎的指揮官，正確選擇戰爭策略，獲得更高的軍銜。 感受令人震撼的二戰場景，盡在HandyGames™的全新模擬類軍事策略遊戲！ 任務簡報 在1941年東部戰線的刺骨嚴寒中戰鬥！ 指揮坦克和步兵 攻克敵陣！ 派重型轟炸機 炸平敵軍指揮部！ 在惡劣地形中佈置你的炮兵部隊！ 為部隊提供物資和彈藥！ 抵禦人數遠超自身的敵人！ - 去除廣告！ - 二戰題材的回合制策略遊戲 - 激動人心的戰役和充滿挑戰的任務 - 白熱化的多人戰鬥 - 經典的德國 和蘇聯部隊 - 戰鬥中可修理，偽裝，構築各種人員和建物 - 雙方擁有步兵，炮兵，坦克和空軍 - 六角網格可一覽無餘 - 細膩的圖片和極為真實的聲效 感謝您選擇1941 Frozen Front！

应用截屏

iPhone

iPad

  • 主線第八章：HK$ 88.00

应用描述

用悠揚樂聲拯救世界，全新體驗的繪本風角色扮演音樂遊戲！ 扮演主角探索地圖，以音樂遊戲進行「調律」，讓黑白無聲的世界恢復生機。 隨著劇情演進，逐步解鎖遊玩多樣風格的樂曲，享受令人震撼的boss關卡演出，與欣賞精美的繪本故事！ 《獎項與成就》 2016 國際行動遊戲大獎 1st IMGA SEA「最佳音樂音效獎 Excellence in Audio」 2016 GAME STAR遊戲之星票選Taiwan Indie Game項目金獎 2017 台北國際電玩展 獨立遊戲獎 Indie Game Award 「最佳音樂音效獎 Best Audio」 2017 13th IMGA Global 入圍 2017 Indie Prize Award in Casual Connect Asia 「最佳行動遊戲 Best Mobile Game」 入圍 《遊戲特色》 >> 新穎動感的音樂遊戲 獨創多變的盤面動畫，隨著音樂節奏點擊滑動，遊玩數十位作曲家創作的高品質樂曲，和觀看魄力十足的boss關卡特別演出。我們為音樂遊戲的初學者到專業玩家分別打造適合的難易度與挑戰課題，鍛鍊自己的實力同時解鎖隱藏要素吧！ >> 精緻迷人的繪本故事 「我相信，受音律眷顧的你一定可以恢復世界原本的秩序。」 當各地點的紊亂能量藉由「調律」恢復秩序，世界原本的姿態也逐漸展現在眼前。在地圖上逐步探索未知的地點，欣賞豐富故事文本與精心繪製的繪本插畫，途中發現的道具就像是旅行的紀念品。 >> 排行榜、成就、成績分享與存檔 收集劇情相關的任務成就，向好友分享成績結算畫面，並在排行榜上與全世界音樂遊戲好手競爭。遊戲支援雲端存檔。 《官方連結》 官方網站：http://noxygames.com/lanota/ 隱私權政策與服務條款：https://noxygames.com/lanota/privacy.html 在Facebook追蹤我們：https://www.facebook.com/lanota/ Twitter: @Noxy_Lanota / @Noxy_Lanota_EN Discord: https://discord.gg/lanota

  • 250 顆寶石：HK$ 128.00
  • 120 顆寶石：HK$ 58.00
  • 50 顆寶石：HK$ 32.00

应用描述

在期盼已久的 「 Clouds & Sheep 」遊戲續集中，可愛的羊羣終於再次得以解放！完成無數任務，滿足綿羊朋友的需求。種植花草樹木並剪不同顏色的羊毛來採購資源！收集快樂星星，收割木材和花瓣，並用它們來爲羊羣提供食物、飾品、玩具和其他東西！控制雲朵，及時降雨，確保綿羊永遠都不會缺飲用水。如果你的綿羊感到高興且滿足，牠們就會生下小羔羊！ 每只動物都需要你的關注！這些滾圓的綿羊喜歡休閒娛樂！讓你的綿羊跳躍起來，並使用蹦牀、蹺蹺板和鞦韆主動和牠們一起玩耍！旁觀你的寵物們互相交流，給牠們一些物品，然後觀察牠們的反應！使用有趣的物品自定義你的羊羣牧場，並從狂野西域和海盜領域等不同設定中進行選擇。旁觀你的羊羣白天不知疲憊地奔跑，而到了晚上就依着溫暖的篝火而眠。儘可能讓綿羊保持心情愉快、身體健康，防牠們變成天空中綿狀的大雲朵。 特色： - 去除廣告！ - 一流遊戲「 Clouds & Sheep 」的精彩續集 - 踏上史詩般的探險之路，找到傳奇般的青春泉水！ - 擁有可愛綿羊的模擬遊戲 - 照顧好羊羣 - 飼養甜美的小羔羊 - 積極和羊羣玩耍 - 給牠們提供許多不同的物品 - 種植並收割不同的資源 - 剪羊毛 - 自定義農場 - 控制天氣 - 日夜循環 - 3D 世界中的開放式遊戲設定 - 適合兒童，但全家人一起玩也非常有趣 - 支持MFi遊戲手柄 - 支持Game Center 感謝您選擇 'Clouds & Sheep 2'！您可以查看最新消息，隨時期待您的意見： 聯絡 HandyGamesTM: http://www.handy-games.com 在 Facebook 上關注我們：http://www.fb.com/handygames 在 Google+上及時瞭解動態： http://goo.gl/qkjngm 訂閱我們的 YouTube 頻道：http://goo.gl/2Kq6yY 在 Twitter 上追蹤新聞： http://www.twitter.com/handy_games 在 Instagram 上關注我們： http://instagram.com/handygames © www.handy-games.com GmbH

將自己小村莊建成一個恢宏的中世紀帝國，打造繁榮的經濟和幸福的居民！尋覓採礦點，收割農作物，向國民徵收稅幣。營建角鬥場、酒館、市場，並用精美的雕塑、壯麗的紀念碑以及蔥郁的花園美化自己的城市。但是，仍然危機四伏。強盜在附近出沒，尋機掠奪和打劫您的和平城鎮。營建兵營，招募勇敢的士兵，建造守衛塔，保護你的鎮民免受傷害。從自己的城堡統治整個帝國，確保臣民歡樂幸福！ 特色 - 去除廣告！ - 中世紀的各種城市營建方式 - 聰明的居民忙碌於日常事務 - 複雜經濟模擬，深度生產鏈 - 數十種不同的城鎮和生產建物 - 軍事功能可選，可訓練士兵，智鬥強盜 - 季節、天氣，都有意義，都有效果 - 火災、疫病、乾旱及更多毀滅性災難 - 豐富多樣的情景和挑戰任務 - 無限制的沙盒遊戲模式 - 支持Game Center

entry.title: Calorie Counter PRO MyNetDiary
entry.content:
优惠信息

App 內購買項目

  • MyNetDiary Premium：HK$ 548.00 → HK$ 68.00 [HK$ 68.00 ~ HK$ 548.00]

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 32.00

App 內購買項目

  • MyNetDiary Premium：HK$ 68.00

应用描述

Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. USERS SAY… The best Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it! LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!! Fast, intuitive, user friendly I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription. RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE • Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025. • Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine. • Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps. • Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom. DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS • Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads. • Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless. • Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy. • Privacy Focused: No account required. MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world. PROVEN SUCCESS • Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week • Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps A few of the free version features: • Easy food, exercise, and water tracking. • Daily coaching tips and meal reminders. • Customizable dashboard for your goals. • iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support. • Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos. SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES • Up to 108 nutrients tracked • Plan macros • Full set of charts • Timestamps • Carb tracking If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find: • Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback. • Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols. • Macros planning and cycling. • Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos. • Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition. • Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings. • In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet. Subscription Terms: The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html

Filca 是一款單反膠卷相機。 35種膠卷濾鏡和電影效果讓您的照片栩栩如生。 @veteranUser "沒有Filca，你只是在收集時刻， 有了Filca，你在保存記憶。" 使用Filca的專家級手動控制精通您的拍攝。 ■ 手動模式下的快門速度、ISO、白平衡控制 ■ 來自業界領導者如Kodak、Fuji、Agfa的35mm膠卷濾鏡 Filca旨在優化您的快照體驗。 非常適合拍攝人物、自拍、夜景以及捕捉日常生活的微妙美麗。 應用我們的濾鏡，以實現真正的模擬膠片外觀。 主要特性： 帶35mm膠卷濾鏡的自動模式相機 手動模式（曝光和對焦） 對快門速度、ISO的完全控制 各種寬高比：4:3、3:2、16:9、1:1 數字變焦可放大至8倍 手動對焦控制（微距、風景） 來自Fuji、Kodak、Agfa的35mm膠卷濾鏡（包括黑白濾鏡） 膠片顆粒效果 膠片日期打印效果 光學圖像穩定 低功耗模式 自拍模式 EXIF數據存儲（包括位置數據） 人像增強 全分辨率照片 定時器和閃光燈功能 網格模式視圖 專業特性： 白平衡調整功能 日期打印功能 在Instagram上使用#filca分享您的照片，我們期待展示您的作品。 關注我們的Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/ 使用條款：https://han.gl/HCCwV 隱私政策：https://han.gl/Wclkw 讓我們與Filca一起提升您的攝影旅程。

entry.title: SimplePlanes
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 48.00 → HK$ 22.00 [HK$ 22.00 ~ HK$ 48.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：HK$ 22.00

应用描述

Build airplanes by snapping parts together, designing wing sections, and attaching engines. At any time, you can strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies with realistic physics. If you're not in the mood for building, over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free. BUILD AIRPLANES You have the tools you'll need to bring any airplane to life. Snap parts together to build your airplane's body. Place engines to add thrust. Design and attach wings and then strap yourself into the cockpit and see how it flies. DOWNLOAD AIRPLANES Over 250,000 airplanes are available to download for free from SimplePlanes.com. Find anything from old WW2 bombers to next-generation fighters to sci-fi spacecraft. You can upload your own airplanes and rise through the ranks from a bronze builder to a gold level builder. DYNAMIC FLIGHT MODEL Flight simulation at its finest. Every little change you make in the designer impacts how the airplane flies. Weight distribution, thrust, lift, and drag are all calculated continuously while flying. Parts can break off in spectacular fashion while flying due to over-stress or by hitting something. The fun won't stop there though. You can keep on flying even with a missing wing if you've got the skills. SANDBOX MODE Use all available parts to build airplanes with no restrictions. The sky is the limit. Literally. CHALLENGES Climb into the cockpit of one of your custom aircraft and see how it does in the challenges. Land on aircraft carriers, dodge surface-to-air missiles, race through courses, and so much more. EDUCATIONAL Tutorials will help players learn the basics of real airplane design and the considerations that need to be taken when airplanes are made.

entry.title: Grand Agent: It Call
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 2.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 8.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 118.00

应用描述

In this exciting mobile game, you will become a legendary agent and embark on a secret operation codenamed "zero". Your mission is to sneak into the enemy's aircraft base and destroy all enemy aircraft. You will face many threats alone, but fortunately, you have a support aircraft to provide you with airdrop supplies. The gameplay of the game is simple but challenging. You will control the agent to move left and right on the runway of the aircraft base to avoid the attacks of enemy aircraft and the falling missiles. The top of the screen is the flight area of ​​​​the enemy aircraft, and they will continue to fire missiles at you in an attempt to shoot you down. You need to stay alert at all times to avoid these deadly threats. By clicking on the screen, you can fire into the sky and destroy enemy aircraft. There is also a "continuous shooting mode" in the game. After turning it on, you can continue to fire into the air and eliminate the enemy more efficiently. But be careful, once the enemy's missiles fall to the ground, they will cause great damage to you. You only have 3 chances to be hit. Once this number is exceeded, the game will end. During the battle, the support aircraft will regularly drop airdrops for you. These airdrops contain a variety of useful props, such as ammunition boxes for replenishing bullets, medical kits for restoring health, and upgrade props for strengthening missiles. Proper use of these airdrop props will help you gain an advantage in battle. As the game progresses, as long as you can hold on longer, you will get additional upgrade opportunities. Every upgrade will make you stronger, whether it is improving firepower, increasing health, or unlocking more powerful props, which can make you more confident when facing the enemy. The longer you hold on, the greater the benefits you will get. The ultimate goal is to defend yourself for as long as possible and destroy more enemy aircraft. This is a mini casual game that can start an exciting agent journey anytime, anywhere. Simple and easy-to-use operations, coupled with challenging gameplay, allow you to experience the thrill of exciting battles in fragmented time.

应用描述

In a desolate wilderness, the atmosphere is tense. You are standing in an open area, and suddenly, a group of ferocious wolves surround you from all directions. Their eyes are flashing with greed, and they are approaching you step by step. At this critical moment, you must pick up the gun in your hand, react quickly, repel these monsters, and protect your life. This is a tense and exciting battle, and also a simple and relaxing casual mini game. ### Gameplay #### Click the screen to fire The operation of the game is very simple. You only need to click the screen to control the character to shoot at the monster. The crosshairs on the screen will automatically aim at the approaching wolf. You only need to click the screen at the right time to fire bullets and repel the monster. This simple and intuitive operation method allows players to easily get started and quickly get into the game without complicated tutorials. #### Dynamic aiming and reaction Although the operation of the game is simple, the actions of the monsters are full of uncertainty. The wolves will attack you from different directions and angles. You need to stay alert at all times, react quickly, and click the screen accurately to effectively repel them. As the game progresses, the number of monsters will gradually increase, and their actions will become more cunning and rapid, which requires players to constantly improve their reaction speed and aiming accuracy. #### Easy restart, continuous challenge The game has a very fast pace. Once surrounded or hit by monsters, the game will end. But don't worry, the game provides an easy restart mechanism. You can restart the game with just a click and get back into this exciting battle. This fast restart mechanism allows players to try multiple times in a short period of time, constantly challenge their limits, and easily get the joy of the game. #### Unique and interesting painting style The game uses a unique art style. Although the picture is simple, it is full of fun and tension. The image design of the monsters is both scary and interesting, allowing players to feel a hint of humor in the tense battle. The scene design of the game is also very rich. From the barren wilderness to the abandoned town, each scene has its own unique atmosphere, making players feel as if they are in a real combat environment. #### Endless challenges and fun Every game is a new challenge. The action mode and number of monsters will be different, which requires players to constantly adjust their strategies and reactions. As the game progresses, you can also unlock new weapons and props to improve your combat effectiveness and better deal with more powerful monsters. This endless challenge and constantly improving gameplay allows players to immerse themselves in the game for a long time and enjoy the fun of shooting. In this exciting battle, you will be surrounded by various monsters, but with your courage and wisdom, you will be able to repel them and win. Come join this battle, experience simple and easy gameplay, and enjoy endless challenges and fun!

entry.title: Yōkai Retreat SP Yin Yang-Sama
entry.content:
优惠信息（价格：HK$ 2.00 → 免費 [免費 ~ HK$ 88.00]）

全部价格信息

价格：免費

App 內購買項目

  • Diamonds：HK$ 22.00

应用描述

You will become a brave guardian and embark on an adventure to a shrine surrounded by monsters to help the Onmyoji dispel evil and liberate the trapped monster girl. The game adopts the classic horizontal version of the game. The character you control holds a weapon and stands in the center of the screen, advancing through the various scenes of the shrine as you operate. The road ahead is full of monsters that are malicious to you. They are lurking in the shadows or flying in the air, ready to attack you at any time. You need to keep firing bullets to repel these monsters and protect your way forward. In the process of moving forward, you can collect gold coins and various props floating in the air by controlling the character to jump upwards. Gold coins are an important resource in the game, which can be used to unlock more powerful weapons and upgrade your equipment. Props can provide you with immediate help, such as increasing the number of bullets, increasing the power of weapons, and obtaining a short invincible state. Reasonable use of these props will make you more calm when facing powerful monsters. As you continue to defeat monsters, the distance you travel will become longer and longer, and every corner of the shrine will be gradually liberated by you. Each level has a different scene setting, from the ancient shrine courtyard to the deep woods, to the mysterious basement, each scene has unique monsters and challenges waiting for you. You need to flexibly control the character, dodge the monster's attacks, and accurately fire bullets to eliminate the enemy.
